TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextBoxRenderer extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods used to render a text box control with visual styles. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer>类提供了一套`static`可用于呈现使用操作系统当前视觉样式的文本框控件的方法。 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。 这是很有用，如果您正在绘制的自定义控件应具有的当前视觉样式外观。 若要绘制的文本框中，请使用其中一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>方法。 这些方法提供的各种选项，如应用文本格式或指定文本边界。
如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>将绘制包含当前视觉样式的文本框。 否则为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，你可以检查的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性。
此类将包装的功能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置为的元素之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TextBox.TextEdit?displayProperty=nameWithType>类。 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>方法，以便绘制的文本框。 该控件还允许用户选择其中一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>要应用于文本的值框的文本。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

Docs.summary: Draws a text box control with the current visual style of the operating system.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DrawTextBox (System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState state);

.method public static hidebysig void DrawTextBox(class System.Drawing.Graphics g, valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState state) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DrawTextBox (g As Graphics, bounds As Rectangle, state As TextBoxState)

static member DrawTextBox : System.Drawing.Graphics * System.Drawing.Rectangle * System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState -> unit

Docs.param: The used to draw the text box.
The that specifies the bounds of the text box.
One of the values that specifies the visual state of the text box.
Docs.summary: Draws a text box control in the specified state and bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。

Docs.exception: The operating system does not support visual styles. -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system. -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 调用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%28System.Drawing.Graphics%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Font%2CSystem.Drawing.Rectangle%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%2CSystem.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TextBoxState%29>方法在自定义控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法，以便绘制的文本框。 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsSupported { get; }
.property bool IsSupported
Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsSupported As Boolean
public: static property bool IsSupported { bool get(); };
member this.IsSupported : bool

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a text box with visual styles.
Docs.value: 如果用户已启用操作系统中的视觉样式和视觉样式应用于 windows 的应用程序; 的工作区否则为。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果此属性为`false`，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>方法将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性来确定是否使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer.DrawTextBox%2A>方法。 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxRenderer>类。
